files.prisma/schema.prisma: Complete Prisma schema with all models (User, Project, Room, Asset, Generation, Subscription, CreditTransaction, Order, Team, TeamMember) and enums
files.lib/blob.ts: Vercel Blob storage utilities (upload, delete, metadata)
files.lib/gemini.ts: Gemini 2.5 Flash AI integration with MASTER_AI_PROMPT
files.lib/masks.ts: SAM segmentation mask generation (with mock fallback)
files.app/api/razorpay/verify-webhook/route.ts: Razorpay webhook handler with signature verification
files.actions/generation.ts: AI generation server actions (redesign, replace, moodboard, shopping list)
files.actions/user.ts: User profile and credits server actions

instructions.md:
See instructions.md for full setup instructions including:
- Database setup (Neon PostgreSQL)
- NextAuth configuration (Email + Google)
- Razorpay setup (subscriptions, orders, webhooks)
- Gemini AI setup
- Vercel Blob storage
- Environment variables
- Deployment guide
- Troubleshooting
